Hey, everyone!
 
Someone has posted a request over on the livejournal for some advice & feedback about a shinsengumi-themed tattoo.  They already have the makoto flag tattoo-ed on a shoulder and looking for some kind of phrase (and the kanji, I suspect) to go with a fan design they're having done next.  Now's your chance to suggest those tattoo-ed phrases you've always wanted yourself and never had the guts to do.  :-D
 
http://www.livejournal.com/community/shq_spy_office/4072.html#cutid1
 
Can some of you far more knowledgeable than me help them out with some suggestions?  I'd love to show them how crazy we are.   If you don't have a livejournal account (well, why not?) and want to answer their questions and/or contribute suggestions, I'm willing to pass it on.
 
phil
